query:
SELECT 
  c.id as customer_id,
  c.email,
  c.balance,
  c.bonusBalance,
  COUNT(re.id) as total_bonuses,
  COALESCE(SUM(re.amount), 0) as total_bonus_amount
FROM customers c
LEFT JOIN referral_earnings re ON re.affiliateId = c.id
WHERE c.email = 'fcokelrihbrito@gmail.com'
GROUP BY c.id, c.email, c.balance, c.bonusBalance

  c.bonusBalance,
  COUNT(re.id) as total_bonuses,

FROM customers c
LEFT JOIN referral_earnings re ON re.affiliateId = c.id
